column7: Principles of accompanying singers and instrumentalists. Practical experience in accompanying and facility in sight reading for keyboard performers. 2 or 4 undergraduate hours. 2 or 4 graduate hours. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Advanced undergraduate or graduate standing in music or music education, and consent of instructor.
